metadata.title: USN-6798-1 -- GStreamer Base Plugins vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GStreamer Base Plugins incorrectly handled certain EXIF metadata. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code or cause a crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6798-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gir1.2-gst-plugins-base-1.0 - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 gstreamer1.0-alsa - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 gstreamer1.0-gl - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-base - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-base-apps - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-base-doc - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 gstreamer1.0-x - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 libgstreamer-gl1.0-0 - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-0 - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-dev - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.3 No subscription required
